content: Am I the only one that misses those?

@Jose Costa Teixeira not at all!! You can invite people to join you in one in the app. = ) Come to the Pub Crawl tonight too. It is our virtual networking reception. More information will be told at the end of the Plenary today. Also, don't miss today at roughly 337, just before the Annual Business Meeting. The Bow Tie Sig is making their appearance.
